author: tiouma
content:
Hello ! Not sure I'm asking it in the right channel : Will unstaking of ETH from the beacon chain be possible after the "Quick Merge" scheduled EOY/early 2022 ? Or this will only be possible after full release of ETH 2.0 (sharding etc..).
Trying to evaluate the opportunity cost of Staking right know by guessing a safe minimum lockup period for staked ETH.
Thanks !

author: sky.cactus
content: No, withdraws won't be part of The Merge.

author: sky.cactus
content: I recommend against using the term "ETH 2.0".  It is pretty amorphous and just refers to a bunch of different future features.

author: sky.cactus
content: The consensus switch (The Merge) is the next upcoming major change.  Sharding is some undefined point in the future.  Withdraws will *probably* arrive sometime between the two.

author: sky.cactus
content: I recommend expecting 1-2 year lockup *at least* when it comes to planning.
